author: Eli Sisco
comment: The app loads and shows you the weather for the next several hours as designed, but does not display notification cards of any type. It doesn't display cards or vibrate when you receive a text, call, email or notification of any kind.
title: Not working properly

author: Andersen Ooi
comment: cannot find the this watch face after install (android wear, watchmaker, facer all dont have)

reply.author: Iris Innovations
reply.content: This is a standalone watch face. Android Wear often takes several minutes to sync new downloaded watch faces, after which you should see it in the Android Wear watch faces list & the on-watch long-press menu (both under "Smart WatchFace" - sorry if the listed name caused confusion). You will also see the companion "Weather Watch" app on the watch.

title: cannot find the this watch face after install

author: 叮鈴噹啷WMS
comment: After install cannot find ?!? Sorry to tell you that My Gear2 still cannot use your app.

reply.author: Iris Innovations
reply.content: Sorry you are having trouble. Your problem may be a common one for Android Wear watch faces -- there is an arbitrary delay between installing on the mobile device and syncing to the android wear device. I've seen as long as about 5 minutes, assuming the watch is connected correctly. Hopefully this was your issue and it has resolved itself by now.
